summary: The 'Instituting Notification Formalities On Reorganizing Mail Act of 2025' (INFORM Act of 2025) mandates the United States Postal Service (USPS) to publicly announce significant changes affecting postal services nationwide. It requires the USPS to notify the Postal Regulatory Commission, post notices in postal facilities detailing the changes, timelines, impacts, and comment opportunities. This bill aims to improve transparency and public awareness regarding changes to postal services.
